name: Unify
description:
Unify is smart twist on the beloved by many Tetris mechanic. In Unify two blocks simultaneously move from sides to the middle of the screen. The goal of the game is to make combinations of same colored blocks.

Unify is an early game from Zach Gage who later will be known for taking the old classic concepts, turning them upside down and creating something truly new and unique. He'll later follow with the Chess, Pool and Solitaire inspired games.

In Unify you'll find more than 40 levels, 3 game modes, 13 song soundtrack and high quality sound that'll make happy fans of Luminos.
